mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (ID, M_EMAIL, M_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, POST_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT) values(BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{mEmail}, #{mNickname}, #{profileImg}, #{postType}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update BOARD set TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, UPDATE_DATE=SYSDATE where ID=#{id}
update BOARD set HITS=HITS+1 where ID=#{id}
update BOARD set REPLY=#{count} where ID=#{id}
update BOARD set FILES=0 where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select NVL(MAX(ID),0) from BOARD where M_EMAIL=#{email}

select * from (select ROWNUM posts, ID, M_EMAIL, M_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, POST_TYPE, TITLE, POST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, HITS, REPLY, FILES from BOARD where POST_TYPE=#{type} order by ID desc) where posts BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}

select * from (select ROWNUM posts, ID, M_EMAIL, M_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, POST_TYPE, TITLE, POST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, HITS, REPLY, FILES from BOARD where M_EMAIL=#{email} order by ID desc) where posts BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}
select nvl(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) from BOARD where POST_TYPE=#{type}
select nvl(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) from BOARD where M_EMAIL=#{email}

select * from (select ROWNUM posts, ID, M_EMAIL, M_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, POST_TYPE, TITLE, POST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, HITS, REPLY, FILES from (select * from BOARD where POST_TYPE=1 order by LPAD(id, 10, '0') desc)) where posts BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}

choose.when: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, M_EMAIL, M_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, POST_TYPE, TITLE, POST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, HITS, REPLY, FILES from (select * from BOARD where POST_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-#{period} AND CURRENT_DATE AND POST_TYPE=1 intersect select * from BOARD where ${nameOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by LPAD(id, 10, '0') desc) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}
choose.otherwise: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, M_EMAIL, M_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, POST_TYPE, TITLE, POST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, HITS, REPLY, FILES from (select * from BOARD where ${nameOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND POST_TYPE=1) order by LPAD(id, 10, '0') desc) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}

mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM list, ID, M_EMAIL, M_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, POST_TYPE, TITLE, POST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, HITS, REPLY, FILES from BOARD where POST_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-#{period} AND CURRENT_DATE AND POST_TYPE=1 order by LPAD(id, 10, '0') desc) where list BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}

choose.when: select NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) from (select * from BOARD where POST_DATE BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE-#{period} AND CURRENT_DATE AND POST_TYPE=1 intersect select * from BOARD where ${nameOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
choose.otherwise: select NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) from (select * from BOARD where ${nameOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND POST_TYPE=1)

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ID ID, M_EMAIL, M_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, POST_TYPE, TITLE, POST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, HITS, REPLY, FILES, LAG(ID,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY ID ASC) AS PREVID, LEAD(ID,1,-1) OVER(ORDER BY ID ASC) AS NEXTID FROM BOARD where POST_TYPE=1) WHERE ID= #{id}
